thread.title_full: Remitly | Send Money Home reviewed by Maria Cecilia Livica

author: Maria Cecilia Livica
title: Maria Cecilia Livica
text: In two days my daughter got the money that i sent! Great job! But i got one question coz right now I'm still waiting for the $30 Walmart gift you promise once the transaction completed it's been 2 weeks! Thanks!
